Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using rat brain extracts.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: No significant phosphorylation detected for moesin at Thr558.
Readout description.Result Description: Peptide detection of moesin at Thr558 was not observed under LRRK2 activation.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: No significant phosphorylation detected for ezrin at Thr558.
Readout description.Result Description: Peptide detection of ezrin at Thr558 was not observed under LRRK2 activation.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: No significant phosphorylation detected for radixin at Thr558.
Readout description.Result Description: Peptide detection of radixin at Thr558 was not observed under LRRK2 activation.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each sample.

Technical replicates.Description: Two technical replicates were used for peptide quantification.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type extracts served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Unphosphorylated extracts served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: No specific threshold determined as the assay did not detect phosphorylation at Thr558.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: No specific threshold determined as the assay did not detect phosphorylation at Thr558.

Approved assay.Approved assay: The use of mass spectrometry in this context is approved for studying Parkinson's Disease.
